sentences.en: At last, one of the company's most skillful " trouble - shooters " was sent to interview this stormy petrel.
sentences.cn: 最后, 电话公司派出一位最富经验、技巧的 [ 调解员 ],去拜访这位不讲理的客人.

sentences.en: Footage also showed mice devouring Atlantic petrel and great shearwater chicks.
sentences.cn: 画面还显示，老鼠吞噬大西洋海燕和大海鸥类飞鸟的幼雏。

sentences.en: Sinclair Lewis was stormy petrel in his life as in his books.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱·刘易斯在他的生活中也像他的书中一样是个制造麻烦的人.

sentences.en: The petrel came winnowing in from afar on the sea.
sentences.cn: 海燕从遥远的地方振翼飞来.

trans.tran_en: a black and white sea bird
